data.name: Tetrad #1: Four objects of simple types
data.description:
Hello, this is my first Kata.

## Task
Write a function that takes a number and returns four items in the list. 

The first item will be an integer.

The second item will be a float. 

The third item will be a string. 

The fourth item will be a tuple. 

## Input
Integer n.

## Output
An array of four objects.
If the value is not an integer, you must return None.

## Example
For number = 3, the output should be ```[3, 3.0, "3", (3,)]```.

For number = 99, the output should be ```[99, 99.0, "99", (99,)]```.

For number = 35.0 , the output should be ```None```.

## Collection
[Tetrad](https://www.codewars.com/collections/tetrad)
